bible.derived: Hebrew Masoretic Text, Hebrew and Aramaic New Testament sources.

translations.name: Hebraic Roots Version
translations.description: The Hebraic Roots Version Scriptures is a translation of the Tanakh/Old Testament from the Hebrew Masoretic Text. Revised from the public domain JPS 1917 edition, and placed together with a revised edition of the Hebrew Roots New Testament (based on Hebrew and Aramaic sources) each with useful footnotes, and an informative preface to the whole work.
